comments.en:
Epson provides a free (LGPL) driver for this printer. With this the printer works to its full extent.

This printer has one imaging drum and one laser for each colour and therefore has the same speed in colour as in bw (16 pages/min max.).

There is also an AcuLaser C4000T model with two additional 500-sheets trays. The standard model has one main tray for 500 and multi-purpose tray for 100 sheets.
